name: geb-subgraph
description: The Graph protocol subgraph for GEB

scripts.deploy-local: npm run codegen && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 reflexer-labs/rai
scripts.deploy-local-test: npm run prepare-test && npm run create-local; npm run deploy-local
scripts.deploy-local-kovan: npm run prepare-kovan && npm run create-local; npm run deploy-local
scripts.deploy-local-mainnet: npm run prepare-test && npm run create-local; npm run deploy-local
scripts.deploy-hosted-kovan: npm run prepare-kovan && npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ reflexer-labs/rai-kovan
scripts.deploy-hosted-mainnet: npm run prepare-mainnet && npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ reflexer-labs/rai

author: Guillaume Felley
